title: Product of Sine and Cosine Formula
text: The formula to express the product of sine and cosine as a sum is 1/2[sin(a+b)+sin(a-b)].

title: Using Formula to Simplify
text: To rewrite the product as a sum, identify the unknown angles for a and $$b$$ and plug into the formula.

title: Identify Unknown Angles
text: From the formula structure of sin(a)cos(b), what is the value of angle a?

title: Identify Unknown Angles
text: From the formula structure of sin(a)cos(b), what is the value of angle $$b$$?

title: Plug into Formula
text: The initial coefficient of $$2$$ is removed by the $$\frac{1}{2}$$ constant multiplier from the formula.
